channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- iFlyChat – WordPress Chat

item.title: CVE-2021-24343|2024-08-03T19:28:23.568Z -- unknown -- iflychat%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20chat
item.description: The iFlyChat WordPress plugin before 4.7.0 does not sanitise its APP ID setting before outputting it back in the page, leading to an authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue
